channel.title: How was this done?
channel.description: Well, I'm sitting here quite embarrassed because I laughed so hard when my friend said he could hack my MSN with my IP and birth date. I gave him both, and in 2 hours he had full access to my hotmail account. He said he found a loophole in MSN's recovery system, and if you provided them with a recent IP, and their full name and birthdate, you could reset their password. Basically, I'm asking for confirmation on this; has anyone done this before? Although this wasn't really "hacking" into my account, him and I have different definitions of hacking.

item.title: How was this done?
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

the bank:

I’d also like to be PMed a link to this guide, I can’t find this ‘xPC’ site.

I found it instantly…
http://team-xpc.com/showthread.php?p=21741

It’s not really as easy as it originally sounds. I tried it with my own account giving all the details it allegedly needs, and couldn’t manage to hack it.

Read full topic

item.title: How was this done?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

inertia:

Can you still get somebody’s IP on MSN with netstat? Then all you need to do is find out their birthday…

Yeah if you make a direct connection with them, such as transfering a file or sharing webcams

Read full topic

item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

inertia:

Can you still get somebody’s IP on MSN with netstat? Then all you need to do is find out their birthday…

You can, but I’ve done it before with CommView, muchhh easier.

item.title: How was this done?
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Same concept works for many sites, as long as the IP is recent you shouldn’t have much trouble getting it back.

Used to work for Jagex until they got smart

Read full topic

item.title: How was this done?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:3, topic:322524”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=418923.msg3078425#msg3078425 date=1262005754]
oh this is easy, there’s more information on it around the internet, if you’ve heard of xPC try checking their site i believe there’s a detailed guide about it there
[/quote]
Wow. Surely hotmail isn’t this stupid?[/quote]
yep, personally i’ve never tried it but people ahve said it worked well for them. The guide itself was pretty simple (assuming you did find the one on the xPC site) but its amazing how something that simple will just slip through and get you access to someone’s hotmail account

Read full topic
